meanings.definition: To move or bend in an angular manner.
meanings.sent1: The robot was angulating its arms to pick up the toys.
meanings.sent2: The car angulated around the sharp corner.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar was angulating its body to spell out its name.
meanings.sent4: The river angulated through the valley like a serpent.
meanings.sent5: She angulated her path through the maze with precision.

meanings.definition: To change direction by forming an angle.
meanings.sent1: The dancer angulated her body gracefully during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The road angulated sharply to the left.
meanings.sent3: The cat was angulating its tail playfully.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts angulated towards a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches angulated upwards towards the sky.

meanings.definition: To cause to move in a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent1: The snake was angulating its way through the grass.
meanings.sent2: The lightning angulated across the sky during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was angulating its path up the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her words angulated around the difficult topic.
meanings.sent5: The stream angulated down the mountain, creating a beautiful pattern.
